taxon.author: (Forsskål, 1775)
taxon.distribution: North, Central and South America. Introduced to Africa, Portugal to Israel, Iran, India, China, Japan, Australia (Tasmania), Pacific Is.

referenceObject.reference: Forsskål, P. (1775). Descriptiones animalium avium, amphibiorum, piscium, insectorum, vermium; quae in itinere orientali observavit Petrus Forskål [sic]. Möller, Hauniae [= Copenhagen], pp. 85-86.
